    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40db7d00-84d8-458e-27aa-3d53ce7e2df5#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Troyon, Constant(in): Tehénpásztor; 1860 körül Szépművészeti Múzeum, Budapest</string>
            <string language="en">Troyon, Constant(in): Cowshepherd, about 1860 The Museum of Fine Art, Budapest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Troyon, Constant(in): Cowshepherd, ungefähr
1860 das Museum der feinen kunst, Budapest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Troyon, Constant(in) : Cowshepherd, environ
1860 le musée de l'art fin, Budapest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Troyon, Constant(in): Cowshepherd, 
aproximadamente 1860 o museu da arte fina, Budapest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Troyon, Constant(in): Cowshepherd, circa 
1860 il museo di arte fine, Budapest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Troyon, σταθερό (in): Cowshepherd, 
περίπου 1860 το μουσείο της λεπτής τέχνης, Βουδαπέστη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Troyon, Constant(in): Cowshepherd, cerca de 
1860 el museo del arte fino, Budapest</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Jobbról balra tehenet vezető férfi tájban</string>
            <string language="en">In the landscape there is a man, who leads cows against the sun</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Németország,  Würzburg,  barokk,  freskó,  </string>
            <string language="en">Germany,  baroque,  fresco  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In der Landschaft gibt es einen Mann, der Kühe 
gegen die Sonne führt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans l'horizontal il y a un homme, qui mène des 
vaches contre le soleil</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Na paisagem há um homem, que conduza a vacas de 
encontro ao sol</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nel paesaggio ci è un uomo, che conduce le 
mucche contro il sole</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στο τοπίο υπάρχει ένα άτομο, το οποίο οδηγεί τις 
αγελάδες ενάντια στον ήλιο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En el paisaje hay un hombre, que conduce vacas 
contra el sol</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Deutschland, Barock, Fresko</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Allemagne, le baroque, fresque</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Germany, baroque, fresco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Germania, baroque, fresco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γερμανία, μπαρόκ, νωπογραφία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Alemania, Barroco, fresco</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
